title: Integrative Medicine
cleaned_text: we believe in treating the whole child. Through Integrative Medicine, we focus not only on the diagnosed condition, but all factors that influence health. We use evidence-based approaches that complement more conventional medicine. These approaches optimize the full spectrum of health, personalizing care that promotes prevention, healing and overall wellness. Our growing team of Integrative Medicine specialists works closely with your child and family. We also stay in communication with your child's other care providers. When you use Integrative Medicine at Phoenix Children's, you get help exploring and prioritizing all available treatment options — from nutrition and supplements to sleep and other lifestyle habits. We're here to give your child the range of care they need.
